title: Ep. 231 "Come Strip For Me and My Man...We'll Pay You"
description:
This week we're discussing one of our favorite pastimes...threesomes. What's the best way to handle these sexual encounters? From the invitation to the exit, we map out proper etiquette and some tips on how to get what so many people want.
